scripts.prod: rm -r build && mkdir build && webpack --config webpack.prod.js --mode production
scripts.prod:win: rd /s /q build && mkdir build && webpack --config webpack.prod.js --mode production
scripts.build: rm -r build && mkdir build && webpack --config webpack.dev.js --mode development
scripts.build:win: rd /s /q build && mkdir build && webpack --config webpack.dev.js --mode development
scripts.start: rm -r build/* && mkdir build && webpack-dev-server --progress --config webpack.dev.js --mode development
scripts.start:win: rd /s /q build && mkdir build && webpack-dev-server --progress --config webpack.dev.js --mode development
